member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.ExceptionHandler

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.AsyncSynchronizationContext
member.summary: AsyncSynchronizationContext helps handling unhandled exceptions with async/await. Source: http://www.markermetro.com/2013/01/technical/handling-unhandled-exceptions-with-asyncawait-on-windows-8-and-windows-phone-8/

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.ExceptionHandlerBase
member.summary: ExceptionHandlerBase is a cross-platform base for attaching to resp. detaching from application wide exception handlers.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.ExceptionHandlingStrategies.RethrowExceptionHandlingStrategy
member.summary: Provides an that always returns false.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.ExceptionHandlingStrategies.RethrowExceptionHandlingStrategy.HandleException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Handles the specified .
member.param: The exception to handle.
member.exception: The specified is always thrown; expect the parameter is null.
member.returns: True if the specified was successfully handled; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The always returns false meaning the was not handled and should be rethrown.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.ExceptionHandlingStrategies.TracingExceptionHandlingStrategy
member.summary: Provides a that traces the exception as FatalError to an . Exceptions are always rethrown.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.IExceptionHandlingStrategy
member.summary: Provides an interface to handle any that is not handled by the application.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.ExceptionHandling.IExceptionHandlingStrategy.HandleException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Handles the specified .
member.param: The exception to handle.
member.returns: True if the specified was successfully handled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService
member.summary: Provides an implementation of for Windows Phone, Windows Store Apps and Universal Windows Platform.

member.name: P:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService.UIDispatcher
member.summary: Gets a reference to the UI thread's dispatcher, after the method has been called on the UI thread.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService.CheckBeginInvokeOnUI(System.Action)
member.summary:
Executes an action on the UI thread. If this method is called from the UI thread, the action is executed immendiately. If the method is called from another thread, the action will be enqueued on the UI thread's dispatcher and executed asynchronously.
For additional operations on the UI thread, you can get a reference to the UI thread's dispatcher thanks to the property
.
member.param: The action that will be executed on the UI thread.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService.RunAsync(System.Action)
member.summary: Invokes an action asynchronously on the UI thread.
member.param: The action that must be executed.
member.returns: The object that provides handlers for the completed async event dispatch.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService.Initialize
member.summary:
This method should be called once on the UI thread to ensure that the property is initialized.
In a Silverlight application, call this method in the Application_Startup event handler, after the MainPage is constructed.
In WPF, call this method on the static App() constructor.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.DispatcherService.Reset
member.summary: Resets the class by deleting the

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Dispatching.IDispatcherService.CheckBeginInvokeOnUI(System.Action)
member.summary:
Executes an action on the UI thread. If this method is called from the UI thread, the action is executed immendiately. If the method is called from another thread, the action will be enqueued on the UI thread's dispatcher and executed asynchronously.
For additional operations on the UI thread, you can get a reference to the UI thread's dispatcher thanks to the property
.
member.param: The action that will be executed on the UI thread.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Tools.PlatformServicesBase.GetAssemblies
member.summary: Returns all assemblies currently loaded in current AppDomain. Source: https://forums.xamarin.com/discussion/21255/device-getassemblies

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper
member.summary: Provides an base implementation of which has to be used to startup and shutdown your application. The startup sequence contains some virtual method calls which can be overriden by your own implementation of .

member.name: F:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.simpleIoc
member.summary: Gets the IOC/DI container of the application, which is being created as part of the application initialization process.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.Startup
member.summary: Runs the startup procedure of the bootstrapper.
member.exception: An unknown exception occurred during the startup process.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.InternalConfigureDefaultTracerFactory
member.summary: Configures a platform-specific default tracer factory. Each target platform can configure

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.InternalConfigureExtensions
member.summary: Make sure all plugin assemblies are loaded and configured accordingly.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.HandleBootstrappingException(System.Exception)
member.summary: A handler for bootstrapping errors occurring during startup and run.
member.param: The exception that has occurred.
member.returns: True if the exception was handled by the method and can be ignored by the caller of this method, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.GetExceptionHandlingStrategyType
member.summary: The purpose of the instance which will be created from the given type is to handle any which is not handled by the application.
member.remarks: When overridden by inheriting classes, this method must return a type which implements . If this method returns null, the is used as default.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.OnStartup
member.summary: Does the actual start procedure for the application or service.
member.remarks: When implemented by inheriting classes, this method will show the shell form of the application or start the service.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.ConfigureContainer(CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc)
member.summary: ConfigureContainer is called when all necessary dependencies are registered. ConfigureContainer is intended to resolve dependencies and configure them before first use.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.Bootstrapper.OnShutdown
member.summary: Does the actual shutdown procedure for the application or service.
member.remarks: When overridden by inheriting classes, this method will close the shell form of the application or stop the service.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.BootstrappingException
member.summary: The standard exception thrown when a has an error on starting up an application or service.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.BootstrappingException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message that describes the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper
member.summary: IBootstrapper is the application lifecycle manager and the entry point of any application built with CrossPlatformLibrary.

member.name: P:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper.ApplicationLifecycle
member.summary: Returns the current application lifecycle state.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper.Startup
member.summary: Runs the startup procedure of the bootstrapper.
member.exception: An unknown exception occurred during the startup process.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper.Sleep
member.summary: Runs all necessary actions to prepare the application for sleep mode.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper.Resume
member.summary: Runs the resume procedure in order to wake-up a sleeping application.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Bootstrapping.IBootstrapper.Shutdown
member.summary: Runs the shutdown procedure.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.CrossPlatformLibrary
member.summary: CrossPlatformLibrary is an extensible toolkit which provides a basic set of functionality used in most mobile apps such as bootstrapping, exception handling, tracing and UI dispatching.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.IContainerExtension
member.summary: Instances of IContainerExtension are detected via reflection at bootstrapping time. This interface is intended to set-up the IoC container of library projects.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.IContainerExtension.Initialize(CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc)
member.summary: Allows to set-up the given container with plugin-specific dependencies.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc
member.summary: A very simple IOC container with basic functionality needed to register and resolve instances. If needed, this class can be replaced by another more elaborate IOC container implementing the IServiceLocator interface. The inspiration for this class is at https://gist.github.com/716137 but it has been extended with additional features.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc.ContainsCreated``1
member.summary: Checks whether at least one instance of a given class is already created in the container.
member.typeparam: The class that is queried.
member.returns: True if at least on instance of the class is already created, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc.ContainsCreated``1(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the instance with the given key is already created for a given class in the container.
member.typeparam: The class that is queried.
member.param: The key that is queried.
member.returns: True if the instance with the given key is already registered for the given class, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc.IsRegistered``1
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a given type T is already registered.
member.typeparam: The type that the method checks for.
member.returns: True if the type is registered, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc.IsRegistered(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a given type T is already registered.
member.param: The type that the method checks for.
member.returns: True if the type is registered, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.ISimpleIoc.IsRegistered``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a given type T and a give key are already registered.
member.typeparam: The type that the method checks for.
member.param: The key that the method checks for.
member.returns: True if the type and key are registered, false otherwise.

member.summary: Unregisters a class from the cache and removes all the previously created instances.
member.typeparam: The class that must be removed.

member.param: The key corresponding to the instance that must be removed.

member.name: T:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.PreferredConstructorAttribute

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetAllCreatedInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Registering a class or a factory does not automatically create the corresponding instance! To create an instance, either register the class or the factory with createInstanceImmediately set to true, or call the GetInstance method before calling GetAllCreatedInstances. Alternatively, use the GetAllInstances method, which auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.param: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the already created instances of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetAllCreatedInstances``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Registering a class or a factory does not automatically create the corresponding instance! To create an instance, either register the class or the factory with createInstanceImmediately set to true, or call the GetInstance method before calling GetAllCreatedInstances. Alternatively, use the GetAllInstances method, which auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.typeparam: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the already created instances of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the service object of the specified type.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.returns: A service object of type .
member.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Calling this method auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.param: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the instances of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetAllInstances``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Calling this method auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.typeparam: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the instances of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. If no instance had been instantiated before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type corresponding to a given key. If no instance had been instantiated with this key before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created with the same key, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstance``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. If no instance had been instantiated before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.IoC.SimpleIoc.GetInstance``1(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type corresponding to a given key. If no instance had been instantiated with this key before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created with the same key, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
